title: The Opium Connection 1966 | From the JAMES BOND director | with Rita Hayworth & Yul Brynner

sources.title: The Opium Connection 1966 | From the JAMES BOND director | with Rita Hayworth & Yul Brynner
sources.description:
United Nations narcotics agents attempt to trace heroin shipments from the Afghanistan-Iran border to the main European distributor.

Original title: The Poppy Is Also a Flower
Alternative title: The Opium Connection

Director: Terence Young (co-directed with Henry Levin)
Writers: Jo Eisinger (screenplay), Ian Fleming (story), Jack Davies

Main cast:
Senta Berger - Maxine
Stephen Boyd - Agent Benson
Yul Brynner - Colonel Salem
Angie Dickinson - Linda Benson
Trevor Howard - Sam Lincoln (UN agent)
Rita Hayworth - Monique Marko (addictive performance!)
Eli Wallach - Locarno (suspected smuggler)
Omar Sharif - Dr. Rad (Iranian official)
Jack Hawkins - General Bahar
Gilbert Roland - Serge Marko (crime boss)
E.G. Marshall - Coley Jones (UN agent)
Marcello Mastroianni - Inspector Mosca
Anthony Quayle - Captain Vanderbilt
Trini LÃ³pez - Himself (musical cameo)
Hugh Griffith - Salah Rahman Khan (opium supplier)

Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery
Release date: September 21, 1966 
Filming location: Tehran, Iran
